vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.CashOut (patch_18.sol#19-29):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_18.sol#27)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_am) (patch_18.sol#25)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancy_lock (patch_18.sol#28)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: LastMsg in Log.AddMessage (patch_18.sol#46) is a local variable never initialiazed

external-function

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_18.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_18.sol#1): it allows old versions
